references.paper_title: Ein Algorithmus zum Auffinden der Basiselemente des Restklassenringes nach einem nulldimensionalen Polynomideal
references.reason: This paper introduced the Gröbner basis algorithm, a fundamental concept in computational algebra that the current paper builds upon.

references.paper_title: The structure of polynomial ideals and Gröbner bases
references.reason: This paper provides crucial complexity analysis of Gröbner basis computation, establishing its doubly exponential time complexity in the worst case, which is a central theme of the current paper.

references.paper_title: A new efficient algorithm for computing Gröbner bases (F4)
references.reason: This paper introduced the F4 algorithm, a significant advancement in Gröbner basis computation that is referenced in the context of improving mathematical algorithms.

references.paper_title: A new efficient algorithm for computing Gröbner bases without reduction to zero (F5)
references.reason: This paper introduced the F5 algorithm, another major improvement on Gröbner basis computation methods, relevant to the discussion of algorithmic advancements.

references.paper_title: Ideals, Varieties, and Algorithms: An Introduction to Computational Algebraic Geometry and Commutative Algebra
references.reason: This textbook is a widely used and highly cited resource in computational algebraic geometry and commutative algebra, providing fundamental background for the current work.
